stitch/stitches cs = chain stitch uk=chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch uk=slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet stitch uk=double_crochet increase = increase = 2 single_crochet in one st decrease = decrease = two single_crochet together single_crochet 4 increase x n = repeat the pattern between parentheses n times size about 2 76 inches 7 cm long n = the number of stitches in the round supplies - 3 mm crochet hook - yarn yarnart jeans green color 52 or white color 62 red color 90 - scissors stitch marker or scrap piece of yarn - yarn needle tip you can use the same pattern to make larger or smaller toys by using finer or bulkier yarn also you can use a different color yarn pick a crochet hook at least a size smaller than suggested on yarn label and crochet tightly enough to achieve a tight gauge that will not allow the stuffing to show through the fabric *amigurumi_joys crochet patterns are protected by international copyright laws and are intended for personal use only all rights on the link or scan qr code https //youtu be/vs--aui9l-c hat start with white color yarn round 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 = 6 round 2 single_crochet in each st around = 6 round 3 single_crochet 1 decrease x 2 = 4 change to red color yarn round 4 single_crochet 1 increase x 2 = 6 round 5-6 2 rounds single_crochet in each st around = 6 round 7 single_crochet 1 increase x 3 = 9 round 8 single_crochet in each st around = 9 round 9 single_crochet 2 increase x 3 = 12 round 10 single_crochet 3 increase x 3 = 15 round 11 single_crochet 4 increase x 3 = 18 change to white color yarn round 12-13 2 rounds single_crochet in each st around = 18 finish crocheting with slip_stitch cut the yarn and fasten_off here is a video on how to crochet the hat click on the link or scan qr code https
